name: Patrick O'Malley
address: 2828 N Litchfield Rd, Goodyear, AZ 85395 US
description: Whether you’re buying, refinancing, or building a custom home, you have a lot riding on your mortgage banker. Market conditions and mortgage programs change frequently, and it’s critical that you’re dealing with a top professional who will give you quick and accurate advice. With over 15 years of experience, I have the expertise and knowledge you need to choose the right path with your financing. After you’ve applied, I’ll call you to discuss the details of your loan, or you may choose to set up an appointment (by phone or in person). You can call me any time or text or email to start the conversation.
specialties: Physician’s Loans, Construction Loans, Jumbo Financing, Cross-Border Mortgages
background: I am an experienced, service-oriented mortgage lender with a background in financial services, ready to advise you. I have guided countless customers with their mortgage needs - be it to build a custom home, buy their first or next home, or refinance their mortgage loan to meet other goals. Throughout my career I have developed extensive experience in the physician/dentist, construction and Canadian lending space. At BMO, we have developed a winning combination of product, pricing, and process which sets us apart from our competition. Contact me to discuss the various mortgage options available to you.

name: Kate Saethre
address: 7138 E Thunderbird Rd, Scottsdale, AZ 85254 US
description: Whether you are purchasing or refinancing, choosing the right mortgage is an important undertaking. I am committed to helping you find the right financing to suit your needs and to make your mortgage experience as uncomplicated as possible. Let's set an appointment for a time and place that is convenient and get started.
specialties: Physician’s Loans, Construction Loans, Jumbo Financing, Complex Self-Employed Borrowers
background: I am an experienced, service-oriented mortgage lender with financial services experience, ready to advise you. I have guided countless customers with their mortgage needs - be it to transfer a mortgage, buy their first or next home, or to refinance their mortgage loan to meet other goals. With access to competitive mortgage solutions and detailed knowledge of the surrounding area's real estate market, I can make your dreams of owning your own home become a reality. Contact me to discuss the various mortgage options available to you.
